instanceVariables.name: is_moving
instanceVariables.desc: True when the player is moving to a new grid.

instanceVariables.name: movement_lerp
instanceVariables.desc: Value between 0 and 1 used to lerp the player to new grid positions.

instanceVariables.name: new_x_pos
instanceVariables.desc: X position the character should be moving towards.

instanceVariables.name: new_y_pos
instanceVariables.desc: Y position the player should be moving towards.
